name: HSP_BKT_CLAIM_STAT_DETAIL
description: Holds current status reason and additional detail.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLAIM_STATUS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The current claim status reason associated with the claim status update for the accepted claim on the bucket.
